name: BomberHabbit
description:
BomberHabbit is a Bomberman fan game. With this project I wanted to reproduce some of the basic mechanics of the classic Hudson game in RPG Maker.

Features:

-Average session: 15-25 min

-Controls: 
   Movement: Arrow Keys
   Place Bomb: Z/Space/Enter
   Pause: Esc/X
   Fullscreen: F5

-Stages: 7 stages and 1 boss

-Power Ups: 
  speed up
  two bombs
  kick bombs
  
-Automatic save system.

-No need RTP.

Engine: Rpg Maker Vx Ace
